plot: During Gravity Falls' Pioneer Day celebration, the kids attempt to uncover a conspiracy about the town's real founder.

The kids try to expose Pacifica Northwest's fraudulent claim that her great-grandfather was the founder of Gravity Falls. Meanwhile, Mabel tries to prove that she can be serious, but learns her silliness can help. Once they figure out the truth, the kids are about to be sent to a government facility in Washington D.C.—Anonymous

On the annual Pioneer Day at Gravity Falls, the kids discover that the town's founder was a fraud and a hoax, so they set out to expose the truth. However, when they do, Sheriff Blubs and Deputy Durland go after them to stop the secret from being revealed.
